name: Afghanistan Central Business Registry
description: Website not yet searchable

name: The National Centre of Community Organisations (CENOC)
description: The National Centre of Community Organisations oversees and manages the accreditation and categorization of Civil Society Organizations in Argentian.

name: Banque Carrefour des entreprises / Kruispuntbank van ondernemingen
Au Greffe du Tribunal de Commerce Francophone de Bruxelles
description: The Registry of the Francophone Brussels Commercial Court

name: The Companies and Intellectual Property Authority (CIPA)
description: The Companies and Intellectual Property Authority (CIPA) of the Ministry of Trade and Industry in Botswana is mandated to register businesses and protect intellectual property rights through the administration of four pieces of legislation.

name: Canadian Revenue Agency / Agence du revenu du Canada
description: CRA_ACR is legal requirement for bilingual use

name: Commercial Registry, Federal Office of Justice, Switzerland
description: The Swiss Commercial Register is administered by the cantons under the supervision of the Swiss Confederation. All the commercial register entries made by the cantonal register offices are published in the Swiss Official Gazette of Commerce (SOGC) after having been checked and approved by the Federal Commercial Registry Office.

name: State Administration for Industry and Commerce (SAIC)
description: The database is only available in Chinese language

name: Bogota Chamber of Commerce
description: The Bogota Chamber of Commerce is a private, non-for-profit organization whose goal is to foster a sustainable Bogota-Region in the long term, by promoting its residents' prosperity, through services which enhance and strengthen the enterprise capabilities present in the region, and which improve the business environment with an impact over public policies.

name: Access to Registers of Economic Subjects / Entities (ARES)
description: Public registers comprising: the Commercial Register, the Federal Register, the Register of Foundations, the Register’s Institute, and the Register of Public Service Companies. Information on companies is searchable in English and is free-of-charge.

name: Danish Central Business Register
description: The Central Business Register at Virk is available with English headings and categories. It can be used to search for information on all Danish businesses.

name: Centre of Registers and Information Systems (RIK)
description: You can view the data related to you free-of-charge by logging in with your ID-card.

name: Ministry of Social Solidarity and Justice
description: The Ministry of Social Solidarity and Justice is the main registration body for associations and foundations in Egypt.

name: Common Directory of Organizational Units and Offices - DIR3
description: EXCEL Tables: http://administracionelectronica.gob.es/ctt/resources/Soluciones/238/Area%20descargas/Listado%20Oficinas%20AGE.xlsx?idIniciativa=238&idElemento=2745

name: Ministry of Foreign Affairs
description: Charities are registered but no openly searchable database yet available.

name: Ministry of Trade (MOT)
description: The Ministry of Trade is the official ministry to register a business in Ethiopia.

name: The National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies / Institute National de la Statistique et des etudes economiques
description: The National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies provide a registration service for companies and associations with details being held on the SIRENE database

name: Registre de Commerce et des Societies /Trade and Companies Register - Commercial Court Registry
Edubase, by the Department of Education
description: Edubase is provided by the Department of Education and provides a URN for each school, university and other educational establishment in England and Wales

name: UK Government Organisation Register
description: The Government Organisation Register is an authoritative source of government organisations who have a presence on GOV.UK. This register includes ministerial departments and executive agencies but does not include classifications (e.g. arms length bodies) or any form of organisational hierarchy.

name: UK Government Departments Reference Numbers
description: Codes for use by IATI for UK Government Departments.

name: UK Government Departments, Agencies & Public Bodies
description: Use the final segment of the url (below /organisations) as the "registration number", converting all "-" to "_". Keep "registration number" portion all lowercase.

name: The Charity Commission for Northern Ireland
The Guernsey Registry at the Department of Commerce and Employment
Hong Kong Companies Registry
description: Hong Kong Companies Registry registers local and non-Hong Kong companies and statutory returns, de-registers defunct solvent companies and provides the public with services and facilities for inspecting and obtaining company information kept by the Registry.

name: Ministry Home affairs/ Kementerian Dalam Negeri
description: NGO registration can also be done through Ministry Home affairs/ Kementerian Dalam Negeri

name: Ministry of Justice & Human Rights/ Kementerian Hukum Dan Hak
description: Company registration is done through Ministry of Justice & Human Rights/ Kementerian Hukum Dan Hak

name: Ministry of Foreign affairs/ Kementerian Luar Negeri
description: International NGO registration is done through Ministry of Foreign affairs/ Kementerian Luar Negeri

name: NGOs registered at Provinicial Level
description: Registration for NGO in Indonesia can be done at the provincial level. Because there is regional autonomy, each provincial has different requirements. Website is just one example

name: Isle of Man Index of Registered Charities
Government of India, Minstry of Corporate Affairs
description: MCA regulates corporate affairs in India through the Companies Act, 1956, 2013 and other allied Acts, Bills and Rules.

name: Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India
description: Government of India Ministry of Home Affairs Foreigners Division provides registration under the Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act (FCRA).

name: Ministry of Interior
description: The Ministry of Interior is the main registration body in Lebanon. All NGOs are required to register with the Ministry of Interior.

name: Lesotho Council of Non Governmental Organisations
Register of Enterprises of the Republic of Latvia
description: Free of charge information includes type of legal entity; registered office; new or current name or trade name and previously registered or historical name or trade name; registration number; Single Euro Payment Area beneficiary identification code (if allocated); registration date; date of deletion of the legal entity from the register (or the date of reorganisation if the reason for the deletion is a reorganisation); deadline for registration of religious organisations that are subject to re-registration.

name: Chambre de Commerce et d'Industrie du Mali (CCIM)
description: The Chamber of Commerce and Industry of Mali (CCIM) is responsible for the organization and professional representation of organisations and legal persons working in the various branches of commercial, industrial and service activities in Mali.

name: Numero d’Identification Fiscale
description: Malian organisations use Numero-d-Identification-Fiscale (NIF) to identify taxpayers and facilitate the administration of the Malian tax affairs.

name: Ministry of Home Affairs - Central Committee for the Registration and Supervision of Organisations
description: The MHA assigns a registration number to each NGO - this number is time limited, for example 4 years, after which the registration is reviewed.
url: No url for the ministry (as at 2/10/2013)

name: The Council for Non Governmental Organisations in Malawi
NGO Board of Malawi
description: There is a pdf file with a list of registered NGOs, but these do not appear to be registration numbers. New database is planned

name: Securities and Exchange Commission Philippines
description: The Securities and Exchange Commission in the Philippines provides licenses so that corporations, partnerships or associations can transact business in the Philippines.

name: Pakistan Centre for Philanthropy
description: The PCP Certification Programme seeks to bring transparency, accountability and good governance in the nonprofit sector in Pakistan. The first initiative of its kind in South Asia; it involves the evaluation of a nonprofit organisation on standardised parameters of internal governance, financial management and programme delivery.

name: Pakistan Voluntary Social Welfare Agency
description: All NGOs are required to register with their local Voluntary Social Welfare department

name: National Official Business Register
description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries: business, court, and tax. This is the business register.

name: Tax Identification Number
description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries: business, court, and tax. This is the tax register.

name: The National Court Register
description: Every business entry in Poland is assigned an ID in 3 different registries: business, court, and tax. This is the court register.

name: Ministry of Interior (MOI)
description: It’s the official body to register Non-governmental organization in Palestine.

name: Serbian Business Registrations Agency (APR)
description: The SBRA runs business registers as single, centralized, public electronic databases.

name: Legal, Financial and Administrative Services Agency (Kammarkollegiet)
description: A Swedish administrative authority under the Ministry of Finance, which is responsible for the registration of religious communities and organisational units of religious communities.

name: Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA)
description: The Accounting and Corporate Regulatory Authority (ACRA) is the national regulator of business entities, public accountants and corporate service providers in Singapore

name: Slovakia Ministry Of Interior Trade Register
description: Most organisations (including NGOs) have to be registered with the Ministry of Interior for the Trade Register Of The Slovak Republic (Živnostensky Register Slovenskej Republiky) and are allocated a unique registration number

name: South Sudan Relief and Rehabilitation Commission
description: The South Sudan Relief and Rehabilitation Commission (SSRRC) is an agency of the Government of South Sudan. It is the operational arm of the Ministry of Humanitarian Affairs and Disaster Management. The NGO Act 2016 added additional powers to the agency to register any NGO interested in operating in South Sudan.

name: Tanzania Business Registrations and Licensing Agency
NGO Board, Ministry of Internal Affairs
Corporation registration is the responsibility of each state (see link)
Internal Revenue Service / Employer Identification Number
Index of U.S. Government Departments and Agencies
description: Use the final segment of the url (below /federal and excluding the extension) as the "registration number", converting all "-" to "_". Keep "registration number" portion all lowercase.

name: International Aid Transparency Initiative Organisation Identifier
description: XI-IATI is a list of organisation identifiers that is maintained by the IATI Secretariat. Any publisher may apply to the IATI Technical Team for an identifier to be generated.

name: Public Bodies
description: Public Bodies aims to provide a unique ID for every part of every government.

name: OECD Development Assistance Committee
description: See Donor, Agency, and Delivery Channel codes

name: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs
description: OCHA is the part of the United Nations Secretariat responsible for bringing together humanitarian actors to ensure a coherent response to emergencies.

name: SA Revenue Service Tax Exemption Unit / Public Benefit Organisations
